tool_description: Manages product and service information including descriptions, pricing, categories, and inventory status for accurate invoice line item creation.

product_codes.description: List of product or service codes to retrieve

pricing_date.description: Date for historical pricing lookup in date-time format

customer_tier.description: Customer pricing tier for tiered pricing

error_messages: Product not found: One or more product codes do not exist in the catalog. Verify all product codes are correct.
Invalid currency code: The specified currency is not supported. Use a valid ISO 4217 currency code.
Pricing data unavailable: Historical pricing for the specified date is not available. Use a different date or current pricing.
Customer tier invalid: The specified customer tier is not recognized. Use a valid tier designation.
Product discontinued: Product is discontinued and include_discontinued is false. Set include_discontinued to true or remove the product.
usage: Provide an array of product_codes to retrieve product information. Optionally specify pricing_date for historical prices, currency for price conversion, and customer_tier for tiered pricing.

products.description: Array of product information strings containing code, description, price, and category

pricing_currency.description: Currency used for all returned prices

pricing_effective_date.description: Date when the returned prices are effective
